newsitem.title: UK: IFC sets three-tranche IBEX-linked peseta issue.
newsitem.headline: IFC sets three-tranche IBEX-linked peseta issue.

text.p: The International Finance Corporation has issued a 30 billion peseta IBEX-linked issue in three equal tranches, lead manager BBV said on Thursday.

Tranche A has a coupon of 4.30 percent and matures on October 18, 2001 at 99.0. Tranche B has a coupon of 4.35 percent and matures on October 19, 2001. Tranche C has a coupon of 4.40 percent and matures on October 22, 2001.
The issue price of all tranches is par and the pay date is April 18. The issue is rated AAA by both Moodys and S&P.
Listing is in Madrid and denominations are 10 million.
